mapper.select: SELECT ss.shop_id AS shop_id , s.name AS shop_name , MONTH(DATE) AS month , SUM(quantity) AS quantity, ROUND((SUM(ss.quantity)*(p.consumer_price-p.first_cost)*((100 - ifnull(st.discount,0)) * 1/100 )),0) AS whole_money FROM shop_sales ss JOIN product p ON ss.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN shop_stock st ON ss.product_id = st.product_id AND ss.shop_id = st.shop_id JOIN shop s ON s.shop_id = ss.shop_id WHERE DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{year}, '-', LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0'), '-%') GROUP BY ss.shop_id, MONTH(DATE) ORDER BY ss.shop_id, MONTH(DATE)
